Lewd alt: @LewdStephyr

Transfem demisexual autigirl in my early 30's.

Nonbinary Transfem, Autistic, Parent, Software Developer, D&D nerd, metalhead. Delightfully awkward.

Embedded dev busy melting their CPU with bitbake.

I don't always pickup on tone easily. Tone indicators (/s, /j, /gen, etc) are a greatly appreciated accessibility tool! If I end a sentence with "lol" when it's not appropriate, it's probably a masking thing that I'm working on.

I want to make friends, but I don't know how. Do you want to be my friend?

Flirting is ok if you're LGBTQ+ (no DMs though please), but I kind of don't understand it. Most likely I won't pick up on it, or think you're being funny. If I do pick up on it, I'll probably be scared and confused 🙃. /flirty tone indicator would be appreciated!

Wife of @technicolourpenguin@void.lgbt 🥰
